.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx1030_vdst_4d2300:

vdst
====

Data loaded from memory.

This is an optional operand. It must be used if and only if :ref:`lds<amdgpu_synid_lds>` is omitted.

*Size:* 1 dword.

*Operands:* :ref:`v<amdgpu_synid_v>`
